title: How to get more ip?
body: I've been playing the game for a bit, and I just seam to be only getting 30-48 ip per game, and I used to be getting ip upwards from 100 what happened? (i'm level  7)

replies.body: You might be referring to the first win of the day bonus, but you also get more IP from playing different game modes. You could have also have had an IP boost active from verifying your email maybe?
